Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and expectations. This product is not just an item but a testament to quality and excellence. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For this unique opportunity, I am extending the offer to purchase the product for $120. It's an investment that promises to deliver long-term value. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
